Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: City South provides a prime office location to the South of Aberdeen, around 5 miles from the City Centre. The office park can be accessed directly from the A90 and is located adjacent to the proposed new park and ride and only a short drive to the southern junction of the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route. Phase 1 has been speculatively developed and comprises of five office pavilions totaling 34,325 sq ft which are ready for immediate occupation. Future phases will be developed to provide around 750,000 sq ft of high quality office space.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Prominent Office Park Space to Let

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The property is situated on the south side of Albyn Place, within the heart of Aberdeen’s West End office district in close proximity to the West End of Union Street, the principal shopping thoroughfare. By virtue of its location, the property benefits both from a highly desirable business address and also from one of the most prominent settings in the prime West End office district.

The subjects are located on Carden Place in the heart of Aberdeen’s West End office district. The property is prominently located at the junction with Albert Street within walking distance to Albyn Place and Queen’s Road where many of Aberdeen’s professional services firms are located The premises is only 600 metres walk to Union Street, Aberdeen’s main commercial thoroughfare, where new office developments such as The Capitol, The Silver Fin, iQ and Union Plaza area situated.



The subjects comprise converted offices within the Category B listed, detached former Church premises known as Carden- Melville Church. The building is of traditional granite and slate construction with an impressive spire being the main feature. The lower ground floor, with an entrance on Albert Street, is self-contained. It is predominantly open plan with two meeting rooms and benefits from ample natural light from stunning feature windows. There is also a demised tea prep area. There are smaller suites available at the rear of the lower ground and ground floor which also benefit from a self-contained entrance. The remaining accommodation benefits from 5 car parking spaces to the rear of the building, which are accessed via Albert Lane.

Comprises a proposed landmark 10 storey Grade A office development in Aberdeen City Centre. The building is situated between the historic Shiprow and the Adelphi opposite Aberdeen Harbour and parallel to the main thoroughfare of Union Street. Its unique central location is just three minutes walk from the city’s train and bus stations. An impressive 5 storey central atrium arrival space links both Shiprow and Adelphi, rising up through the building to flood the space with natural light.  The Pinnacle boasts 82 secure basement car parking spaces, high quality external finishes incorporating glass and granite, three high speed passenger lifts, air conditioned with design and zoning to provide optimum flexibility for occupiers, low energy, low cost in use building aiming to achieve BREEAM of excellent and an A EPC rating, 150mm full access raised floor system, plant space and risers to allow bespoke occupier fit out plus M&E system capacities to provide flexibility of occupant density.

City Wharf is located in the city centre of Aberdeen, City Wharf has stunning views across the Quayside and harbour area. It is ideally positioned for easy transport access via Virginia Street and Market Street with parking available nearby at the adjacent NCP car park. The property is located on the east side of Shiprow close to its junction with Exchequer Row and approximately 50m south of Union Street and 250m east of Market Street. City Wharf is a mixed use development incorporating a mix of office, leisure and retail uses. The development comprises circa 30,000 sq ft of offices and also includes a 107 hotel operated by Ibis. The available suite comprises Grade A office accommodation located on Level 1
